verses.name: Matthew 22:6
verses.text: And the remnant took his servants, and entreated them spitefully, and slew them.

verses.name: Matthew 22:7
verses.text: But when the king heard thereof, he was wroth: and he sent forth his armies, and destroyed those murderers, and burned up their city.

verses.name: Matthew 22:8
verses.text: Then saith he to his servants, The wedding is ready, but they which were bidden were not worthy.

verses.name: Matthew 22:9
verses.text: Go ye therefore into the highways, and as many as ye shall find, bid to the marriage.

verses.name: Matthew 22:10
verses.text: So those servants went out into the highways, and gathered together all as many as they found, both bad and good: and the wedding was furnished with guests.
